info.title: apaleo Inventory API
info.description: Setup and manage properties (hotels, etc.) and all the entites in them to rent out: Units such as rooms, parking lots, beds, meeting rooms, etc. Units can be combined into groups (single rooms, double rooms).

get.description:
Get the list of properties.
You need to be authorized (no particular scope required)

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting from 1 and defaulting to 1. Results in 204 if there are no items on that page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. If this is not set, the pageNumber will be ignored and all values returned.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

post.description:
Use this call to create a new property.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'properties.create, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description:
Unique key for safely retrying requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. 
We'll always send back the same response for requests made with the same key, 
and keys can't be reused with different request parameters. Keys expire after 24 hours.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The definition of the property.

201.description: Creation of the new property was successful.

Location.description: The location of the created resource.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

patch.description:
Here's a list of allowed operations: - Replace Name - Add, replace and remove Description - Replace CompanyName - Add, replace and remove ManagingDirectors - Replace CommercialRegisterEntry - Replace TaxId - Replace Location - Add, replace and remove BankAccount - Replace PaymentTerms - Set IsTemplate
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'properties.manage, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the property.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Define the list of operations to be applied to the resource. Learn more about JSON Patch here: http://jsonpatch.com/.

schema.description: Define the list of operations to be applied to the resource. Learn more about JSON Patch here: http://jsonpatch.com/.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

patch.description:
Here's a list of allowed operations: - Set unit condition - Set unit description - Set unit name - Set unit unitGroupId - Set unit maxPersons - Add unit attribute - Remove unit attribute
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'units.manage, setup.manage'.

parameters.description: The id of the unit.

get.description:
Get a unit by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the unit.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: 'all' or comma separated list of two-letter language codes (ISO Alpha-2)

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List of all embedded resources that should be expanded in the response. Possible values are: property, unitGroup. All other values will be silently ignored.

patch.summary: Allows to patch one or more units

You must have at least one of these scopes: 'units.manage, setup.manage'.

get.description:
Get the list of units.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'units.read, setup.read, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: Return units for specific property

parameters.name: unitGroupId
parameters.description: Return units for the specific unit group

parameters.name: unitAttributeIds
parameters.description: Return units with the specific unit attributes

parameters.name: isOccupied
parameters.description: Return only occupied or vacant units

parameters.name: maintenanceType
parameters.description: Return units with the specific maintenance type

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Return units with a specific condition

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting from 1 and defaulting to 1. Results in 204 if there are no items on that page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. If this is not set, the pageNumber will be ignored and all values returned.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List of all embedded resources that should be expanded in the response. Possible values are: property, unitGroup. All other values will be silently ignored.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

get.summary: Get all unit groups, or all unit groups for a property
get.description:
Get the list of unit groups.
You must have at least one of these scopes: 'unitgroups.read, setup.read, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: Return unit groups for specific property

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting from 1 and defaulting to 1. Results in 204 if there are no items on that page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. If this is not set, the pageNumber will be ignored and all values returned.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List of all embedded resources that should be expanded in the response. Possible values are: property. All other values will be silently ignored.

204.description: There are no unit groups found.

404.description: The Request-URI could not be found.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

422.description: Validation errors in the request body or query params.

get.description:
Returns number of unit groups matching the filter criteria

You must have at least one of these scopes: 'unitgroups.read, setup.read, setup.manage'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the unit group.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: 'all' or comma separated list of two-letter language codes (ISO Alpha-2)

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List of all embedded resources that should be expanded in the response. Possible values are: property. All other values will be silently ignored.

200.description: Return all the unit group data.

put.description:
Use this call to modify a unit group.

parameters.description: The id of the unit group.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The definition of the unit group.

code.description: The code for the property that can be shown in reports and table views

propertyTemplateId.description: The id of the property used as a template while creating the property

isTemplate.description: Whether the property can be used as a template for other properties

companyName.description: The legal name of the company running the property.

managingDirectors.description: The managing director(s) of the company, as they should appear on invoices

commercialRegisterEntry.description: The entry in the Commercial Register of the company running the property, as it should appear on invoices

taxId.description: The Tax-ID of the company running the property, as it should appear on invoices

paymentTerms.description: The payment terms used for all rate plans

timeZone.description:
The time zone name of the property from the IANA Time Zone Database.
(see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones)

currencyCode.description: The currency a property works with.

created.description:
Date of creation
A date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

countryCode.description: The country code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code

code.description: The code for the property that can be shown in reports and table views
The code for the unit group that can be shown in reports and table views

name.description: The name for the unit group

description.description: The description for the unit group

id.description: The id for the scheduled maintenance

from.description:
Date and time the scheduled maintenance window starts
A date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

to.description:
Date and time the scheduled maintenance window ends
A date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

type.description:
The type of maintenance that is planned for the unit. A small repair (OutOfService),
a bigger disfunction that does not allow to sell the unit (OutOfOrder) or is it
even under construction and should reduce the house count (OutOfInventory)

description.description: The description text for the maintenance

name.description: The name of the unit attribute

maxPersons.description: Maximum number of persons for the unit

Date of creation
A date and time (without fractional second part) in UTC or with UTC offset as defined in ISO8601:2004

attributes.description: Collection of user defined attributes of unit

The type of maintenance that is planned for the unit. A small repair (OutOfService),
a bigger disfunction that does not allow to sell the unit (OutOfOrder) or is it
even under construction and should reduce the house count (OutOfInventory)

attributes.description: Collection of user defined attributes of unit

propertyId.description: The id of the property where the units will be created

description.description: The description, used for all units

unitGroupId.description: The id of the unit group used for all units

maxPersons.description: Maximum number of persons for the units

id.description: The id of the unit attribute

name.description: The name of the unit attribute

description.description: The description of the unit attribute

name.description: The name of the unit attribute

description.description: The description of the unit attribute

code.description: The code for the unit group that can be shown in reports and table views

propertyId.description: The id of the property where unit group will be created

name.description: The name for the unit group

description.description: The description for the unit group

maxPersons.description: Maximum number of persons for the unit group

rank.description:
The unit group rank
Restrictions:
- Should be greater or equal to one

code.description: The code for the unit group that can be shown in reports and table views

name.description: The name for the unit group

description.description: The description for the unit group

memberCount.description: Number of units in this group

maxPersons.description: Maximum number of persons for the unit group

UnitGroupListModel.example:
{
  "unitGroups": [
    {
      "id": "MUC-DBL",
      "code": "DBL",
      "name": "Double Room",
      "description": "This is a nice room with as kingsize bed and flat screen",
      "memberCount": 2,
      "maxPersons": 4,
      "rank": 2,
      "type": "BedRoom",
      "property": {
        "id": "MUC",
        "code": "MUC",
        "name": "Demo Hotel Munich",
        "description": "This is the demo hotel Munich"
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "BER-SGL",
      "code": "SGL",
      "name": "Standard Room",
      "description": "This is a nice room with as standard bed",
      "memberCount": 5,
      "maxPersons": 2,
      "rank": 1,
      "type": "BedRoom",
      "property": {
        "id": "BER",
        "code": "BER",
        "name": "Demo Hotel Berlin",
        "description": "This is the demo hotel Berlin"
      }
    }
  ],
  "count": 0
}

UnitGroupModel.description: With this request you can create a new property

code.description: The code for the unit group that can be shown in reports and table views

name.description: The name for the unit group

memberCount.description: Number of units in this group

description.description: The description for the unit group

maxPersons.description: Maximum number of persons for the unit group

name.description: The name for the unit group

description.description: The description for the unit group

maxPersons.description:
Maximum number of persons for the unit group.
If this value is increased, the surcharges for the related rate plans must be specified in order for the rate plans to be sellable for the new possible occupancies.

rank.description:
The unit group rank
Restrictions:
- Should be greater or equal to one
